description: Start your day with a delicious Egg and Ham Breakfast Sandwich that combines savory ham, fluffy eggs, and melted cheese between two slices of bread. This quick and satisfying meal is perfect for busy mornings or leisurely weekends.
instructions: Heat a skillet over medium heat and add a little butter.
Crack the egg into the skillet and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the white is set and the yolk is cooked to your liking.
While the egg is cooking, toast the bread in another skillet or toaster.
Once the egg is done, place the ham slices in the skillet to warm them up.
Assemble the sandwich by placing the cheese on one slice of bread, followed by the ham, the cooked egg, and then the other slice of bread.
tips: For a perfect sandwich, use fresh ingredients and adjust the cooking time based on how you like your egg cooked.
